title: In Letter, Trump Urged Erdogan to Make a Deal
text:
WASHINGTON—President Trump urged his Turkish counterpart in a letter last week to “make a great deal” with Kurdish fighters following the launch of Turkey’s military offensive in Syria, warning him: “Don’t be a fool.”

White House press secretary Stephanie Grisham confirmed the authenticity of the letter, which was earlier posted on Twitter by a Fox Business Network reporter. The brief letter, written in a highly colloquial style, was sent to President Recep Tayyip Erdogan on Oct. 9, days after Mr. Trump ordered the withdrawal...
